geneVariantDescriptions.description: VHL W117R lies within the CCT complex-binding region of the Vhl protein (UniProt.org). W117R confers a loss of function to the Vhl protein as demonstrated by disrupted fibronectin matrix assembly (PMID: 9651579), decreased Hif1a binding and ubiquitination in in vitro assays (PMID: 11865071), and elevated Hif2a and Glut1 expression in normoxic conditions (PMID: 11865071, PMID: 17526729) and increased cell proliferation under low serum conditions in culture (PMID: 17526729).

references.title: Diverse effects of mutations in exon II of the von Hippel-Lindau (VHL) tumor suppressor gene on the interaction of pVHL with the cytosolic chaperonin and pVHL-dependent ubiquitin ligase activity.
The von Hippel-Lindau tumor suppressor protein is required for proper assembly of an extracellular fibronectin matrix.
Hypoxia-inducible factor linked to differential kidney cancer risk seen with type 2A and type 2B VHL mutations.
